an4.42:1: "Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, pañhabyākaraṇāni. Katamāni cattāri? Atthi, bhikkhave, pañho ekaṁsabyākaraṇīyo; atthi, bhikkhave, pañho vibhajjabyākaraṇīyo; atthi, bhikkhave, pañho paṭipucchābyākaraṇīyo; atthi, bhikkhave, pañho ṭhapanīyo. Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri pañhabyākaraṇānīti.
an4.42:3: Yo ca tesaṁ tattha tattha,jānāti anudhammataṁ;Catupañhassa kusalo,āhu bhikkhuṁ tathāvidhaṁ.
an4.42:4: Durāsado duppasaho,gambhīro duppadhaṁsiyo;Atho atthe anatthe ca,ubhayassa hoti kovido.
an4.42:5: Anatthaṁ parivajjeti,atthaṁ gaṇhāti paṇḍito;Atthābhisamayā dhīro,paṇḍitoti pavuccatī"ti.
